content: Swarm Orchestration Patterns 2026 Research Complete: 352x WASM speedup (Claude Flow V3), sub-millisecond consensus (0.85ms DMAS/CVT, 1000x vs cloud), 97.3% Byzantine accuracy (30% compromised agents), >200% cost variation between topologies (adaptive switching critical). V66-V68 roadmap: 6 weeks, 10 modules, 395 tests. Priority: adaptive topology (>200% ROI), CVT protocol (<1ms validation), reputation scoring (Byzantine resilience), pattern library (reusable orchestration). Production-ready patterns identified: hierarchical (0.20s), mesh (0.15s), CVT consensus, Byzantine tolerance (nâ‰¥3f+1), 4 task decomposition patterns (parallel, pipeline, swarm, research-impl), WASM optimization.
